about_the_game:
Victory is always around you! Guru of motivation will explain to you why fortitude and self-improvement are important. He will teach you how to turn on your handsome-man mode, and how to go only forward to victory! And of course your self-confidence will grow. Dice, 100 gold and 50.000 chips will only contribute to this.

After buying this content, you get to your collection of characters "Player number 7", "Dice number 7", as well as 100 gold and 50,000 chips.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
